explanation: The majority of opinions indicate bullish momentum for BTC, with several users highlighting recent resistance breaks (e.g., $106,500 and $107,200) and potential for new all-time highs. Sentiment is reinforced by positive correlations with tech stock pre-market performance and anticipation of further upward movement if bullish conditions hold. Some users warn of dips or manipulation, but the overall tone is confident in further gains. Representative opinions also include technical analysis references and positive reactions to market catalysts.
